<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4633</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Writing Fractions (Tenths) as Decimal Fractions</string>
            <string language="es">Escritura de fracciones (decenas) como fracciones decimales</string>
            <string language="ga">Codáin (Deichiú) a Scríobh mar Chodáin Dheachúla</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schreiben Brüche (Tenths) als Dezimalbrüche</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Fractions d'écriture (Tenths) en tant que 
fractions décimales</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Frações da escrita (Tenths) como frações 
decimais</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Frazioni di scrittura (Tenths) come frazioni 
decimali</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μέρη γραψίματος (δέκατα) ως δεκαδικά μέρη</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Printable worksheet with questions for pupils concerning the conversion of fractions (tenths) into decimal fractions.</string>
            <string language="es">Hoja de calculo que se puede imprimir con preguntas para los alumnos sobre la conversión de fracciones (decenas) en fracciones decimales</string>
            <string language="ga">Bileog oibre ar féidir a phriontáil le ceisteanna do dhaltaí maidir le hathrú codáin (deichiú) go codáin dheachúla.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Maths</string>
            <string language="es">Matemáticas</string>
            <string language="ga">Mata</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Additional Resource</string>
            <string language="es">Recurso adicional</string>
            <string language="ga">Acmhainn Bhreise</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bedruckbarer Bogen mit Fragen für die Pupillen 
hinsichtlich sind der Konvertierung der Brüche (tenths) in 
Dezimalbrüche.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Tableau imprimable avec des questions pour des 
pupilles au sujet de la conversion des fractions (tenths) dans les 
fractions décimales.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Folha printable com perguntas para as pupilas a 
respeito da conversão das frações (tenths) em frações decimais.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Foglio di lavoro stampabile con le domande per le
pupille riguardo alla conversione delle frazioni (tenths) nelle 
frazioni decimali.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εκτυπώσιμο φύλλο εργασίας με τις ερωτήσεις για τους 
μαθητές σχετικά με τη μετατροπή των μερών (δέκατα) στα δεκαδικά 
μέρη.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mathe</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zusätzliches Hilfsmittel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Maths</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ressource Supplémentaire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Maths</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Recurso Adicional</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Per la matematica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Risorsa Supplementare</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μαθηματικά</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πρόσθετο στοιχείο συμπεριφοράς</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
